author: jmsnell
msg: Fixing a problem with the sniffing code. In certain cases, an error would be thrown for UTF-16/32 encodings that used the BOM

author: mturyn
msg: Added xapTable td{} to allow xapTable cells to inherit font-size from the xap Table widget's enclosing dom node.

author: remm
msg: - If an exception is thrown processing an event which was not an error, the contract says an ERROR event
